paragraph.paragraph: During debugging, the Call Stack Window will be available, from which you may view the current call stack of the system. Below is a screenshot of the Call Stack Window:

This screenshot corresponds to system that has stopped in the creation
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Conventions/index.xmlfeature feature of the
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Conventions/index.xmlroot class Root Class as the Result of a
/10_Developing/10_Getting_Started/10_Using_ENViSioN/70_Debugging_Projects/breakpoints/index.xml Break point being reached. This is why there is only one entry in the list.
